channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 佐治亚州一名法官在亚特兰大驳回了针对前总统唐纳德-特朗普和五名共同被告的选举干扰起诉书中的六项指控，但更广泛的案件仍在审理中。
item.description:
A Georgia judge dismissed six counts in the election-interference indictment against former President Donald Trump and five co-defendants in Atlanta, though the broader case is still intact https://t.co/MsKHo6LAZ6 https://t.co/MsKHo6LAZ6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 最新消息众议院批准了一项禁止 TikTok 在美国运营或强制出售的法案。该法案在参议院的命运尚不明朗。
item.description:
Breaking: The House approved a bill that would ban TikTok from operating in the U.S. or force a sale. The measure's fate in the Senate is uncertain. https://t.co/EqeHr6Stkz https://t.co/EqeHr6Stkz

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 以色列为援助物资进入加沙北部开辟了一条新的陆路通道，因为在人们担心饥荒即将来临之际，向被围困的巴勒斯坦飞地运送食品和其他必需品的国际压力与日俱增。
item.description:
Israel opened a new land route for aid to enter northern Gaza as international pressure mounts to deliver food and other essentials to the besieged Palestinian enclave amid concerns of a looming famine https://t.co/KsmEJqUJfY https://t.co/KsmEJqUJfY

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 欧洲立法者批准了世界上迄今为止最全面的人工智能立法，为人工智能系统开发者制定了全面的规则，并对如何使用人工智能技术做出了新的限制
item.description:
European lawmakers approved the world’s most comprehensive legislation yet on artificial intelligence, setting out sweeping rules for developers of AI systems and new restrictions on how the technology can be used https://t.co/9K1oKd8NBK https://t.co/9K1oKd8NBK

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 🧵 2023 年 3 月 29 日，《华尔街日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）在俄罗斯采访时被拘留。#与埃文同行
item.description:
🧵On March 29, 2023, Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich was detained in Russia during a reporting trip.

Nearly a year later, he remains in a Moscow prison.

We’re offering resources for those who want to show their support. #IStandWithEvan https://t.co/ll83UMXlp5 pic.twitter.com/t4zisQADij

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 谁在你家负责烧烤？包括盖比-达尔金和玛莎-斯图尔特在内的名厨认为，有更多女性可以热衷于后院烧烤。
item.description:
Who is manning the grill at your house? Celebrity chefs including Gaby Dalkin and Martha Stewart see room for more women to get enthusiastic about backyard grilling. https://t.co/9WaaEoAdow https://t.co/9WaaEoAdow

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 独角兽初创企业 Radia 计划利用火箭科学，用一架巨型货机克服风力发电行业的最大障碍之一。
item.description:
Radia, a unicorn startup, has a plan to use rocket science to overcome one of the wind power industry’s biggest hurdles with a giant cargo plane https://t.co/JWeTSnxaIl

item.title: 众议院准备批准一项法案，禁止 TikTok 在美国运营或迫使其出售 TikTok

item.title: Angela Chao 的死引发了关于车辆落水时如何应对的问题。以下是关键的最初 60 秒内应知道的事项。

item.title: 科学研究因复制或篡改图像而遭到破坏。Imagetwin和Proofig等软件品牌让识别欺骗变得更加容易。
item.description:
Scientific studies are getting busted for copied or doctored images. Software brands such as Imagetwin and Proofig are making it easier to spot deceptions. https://t.co/qNyyAN0qOm https://t.co/qNyyAN0qOm

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 从复古风格的唱片机到定制的相框照片，这些都是业内专家信誓旦旦的结婚礼物。
item.description:
From a retro-style record player to a custom framed photo, these are the wedding gifts that industry experts swear by. https://t.co/262ZeSRBE1

— Buy Side from WSJ (@BuySideWSJ) March 9, 2024

item.title: Dollar Tree 在假日季度的盈利被数十亿美元的费用所抵消，这些费用与对公司商店投资组合的审查有关，公司计划在未来几年内关闭约 1000 家商店。
item.description:
Dollar Tree's earnings in the holiday quarter were wiped out by billions of dollars in charges tied to a review of the company’s portfolio of stores, and the company plans to close about 1,000 stores over the next few years https://t.co/uVkA8BMLx5 https://t.co/uVkA8BMLx5

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 世界上最大的加密货币的拥趸们曾希望比特币 ETF 能够打开闸门，吸引新的买家。
item.description:
Fans of the world’s largest cryptocurrency had hoped that the bitcoin ETFs would open the floodgates to a wave of new buyers https://t.co/rA0kUDlvzM https://t.co/rA0kUDlvzM

item.title: 拜登总统提出的 15%企业替代性最低税第一年就打击了杜克能源公司、惠而浦以及投资公司 KKR 和 Blackstone。总统现在希望扩大征税范围。
item.description:
President Biden’s 15% corporate alternative minimum tax hit Duke Energy, Whirlpool and investment firms KKR and Blackstone in its first year. The president now wants to expand the levy.

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 中国交易的低迷已经伤害了华尔街的银行。现在，律师们也感受到了这种痛苦。
item.description:
China’s dealmaking slump has already hurt Wall Street banks. Now, lawyers are feeling the pain. https://t.co/ipDwPJnrb6

item.title: 从月光酒到葡萄酒庄更年长、更富裕的人口涌入阿巴拉契亚，把一个乡村地区变成了热闹的退休天堂。
item.description:

item.title: 在一大批没有比赛经验的分析专家接管大联盟前线办公室二十年后，前球员在棒球高管中卷土重来。
item.description:
Two decades after a wave of analytics experts with no playing experience took over major-league front offices, former players are making a comeback in baseball’s executive ranks. https://t.co/FNuvQcBhW5

item.title: 随着公司债券发行的蓬勃发展，与可持续发展相关的债券却一落千丈。有人说，美国证券交易委员会的新气候规则最终会有所帮助
item.description:
As corporate bond issuance booms, sustainability-linked bonds have plummeted. Some say the SEC’s new climate rule could help eventually https://t.co/SbBeOKtyIK

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 在接受 @JoannaStern 的独家专访时，OpenAI 首席技术官米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）解释了公司新推出的 Sora 人工智能视频工具及其推广计划。
item.description:

item.title: 特别法律顾问罗伯特-赫尔（Robert Hur）在立法者面前作证时辩称，党派政治与他对拜登总统的评价无关，他认为拜登总统是一位记忆力差的老人
item.description:
In testimony before lawmakers, Special Counsel Robert Hur contended that partisan politics had no role in his assessment of President Biden as an elderly man with a poor memory https://t.co/V2ocAxfdAK

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024

item.title: 没有照片，就没有账单。这是越来越多的司机为躲避高速公路收费而采取的办法，他们用篡改或遮挡车牌的方式躲避摄像头。
item.description:
No photo, no bill. That’s the approach more drivers are taking to dodge highway tolls, avoiding cameras with doctored or covered-up license plates. https://t.co/l7D5NeNlZa https://t.co/l7D5NeNlZa

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 13, 2024
